Desc.entry: A registered charity which provides citywide health and safety advice on all workplace hazards such as noise, dust and chemicals. Advises on benefits and compensation claims for industrial diseases. Works with GP surgeries. Provides a service that helps and enables people to manage their workplace health. Has a specialist library. Has an IAPT (Improving Access to Psychological Therapies) Employment Adviser who advises on employment issues, disability discrimination and lack of employer awareness around mental health problems. A registered charity and company limited by guarantee no 2429795.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 9.30am-5pm (office times); various sessions and surgeries, please contact for details or check the website
